Thank you for accepting an invitation to speak in the matcha metaresearch webinar series. Organisers will be in touch with reminders for title and abstract ahead of the talk.

## Recorded webinars

The webinars will be recorded in Teams and uploaded to the NINA youtube channel. In addition, talk and abstract will be posted to this blog. 

## Structure of webinar

- Short introduction from organisers describing structure of webinar
- 20-40 minute presentation from invited speaker
- 10-20 minutes of question time, depending on length of talk
- Less than one hour total
